items.name: Shavronne's Wrappings
implicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed Aura Gems
explicitMods: 146% increased Energy Shield
10% faster start of Energy Shield Recharge
+39% to Lightning Resistance
Reflects 1 to 250 Lightning Damage to Melee Attackers

flavourText: Shavronne's apparel became ever more extravagant
as her body and soul became ever more corrupted.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports aura skills that affect you and allies, increasing the aura's effect on allies, but preventing it from affecting you at all. Cannot support curse auras, or other auras that only affect enemies. Cannot support skills used by totems.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 40% increased Aura Area of Effect
Supported Auras do not affect you
Non-Curse Auras from Supported Skills have 39% increased Effect
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Summon a Holy Relic that stays near you. socketedItems.secDescrText: Casting once reserves mana to carry a banner which increases the armour and evasion of nearby allies, and reduces the critical strike chance of nearby enemies. Gains stages over time while carrying the banner near enemies. Casting the skill again places the banner, ending the mana reservation. Once placed, it becomes more powerful for each stage gained. You cannot have multiple banners at the same time.

You and nearby Allies have 25% increased Armour and Evasion Rating
Nearby Enemies have 40% reduced Critical Strike Chance
Gain 1 Stage every 0.2 seconds while an Enemy is Nearby

Taunt nearby Enemies for 0.15 seconds per Stage on Placing the Banner
Enemies Taunted this way deal 15% less Damage
Base Duration of 10.00 seconds after being Placed
+1 second to Base Placed Banner Duration per Stage
When placed, 8% increased Area of Effect per Stage
When placed, 1% increased Aura effect per Stage
